description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Chicken Pasta with Zucchini and Cherry Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cheesy Chicken Pasta with Zucchini and Cherry Tomatoes
name: Cheesy Chicken Pasta with Zucchini and Cherry Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 L campbells real chicken liquid stock

recipeInstructions.text: Heat remaining oil in frying pan. Add garlic and zucchini and cook for 8 minutes or until golden. Add chicken stock, cherry tomatoes and half the shredded chicken, reserving half to use later. Cook for 2 minutes or until tomatoes have softened and chicken stock is reduced. Stir in salsa verde. Add cooked pasta and tasty cheese to chicken mixture and toss until well combined. Divide among serving bowls and serve topped with parmesan, with lemon wedges alongside.
